ResearchProjectDef.label: basic chiral understanding
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study the fundamental properties of chiral matter and energy. This research forms the foundation for all advanced supernatural technologies.\n\nUnlocks: Basic chiral detection equipment, chiral crystal processing.

ResearchProjectDef.label: chiral crystal processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to safely harvest and process chiral crystals formed by timefall exposure. These crystallized temporal energies serve as power sources for advanced technology.\n\nUnlocks: Chiral crystal refinery, chiral batteries, improved energy storage.

ResearchProjectDef.label: BT detection systems
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop technology to detect Beach Things and other supernatural entities. Early warning systems can prevent dangerous encounters.\n\nUnlocks: BT detectors, odradek scanners, supernatural entity alerts.

ResearchProjectDef.label: timefall protection
ResearchProjectDef.description: Design shelter and equipment to protect against temporal rain. Proper protection is essential for survival in the post-Death Stranding world.\n\nUnlocks: Timefall shelters, protective clothing, temporal shielding.

ResearchProjectDef.label: chiral network basics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Understand the fundamentals of the chiral communication network. This supernatural system enables faster-than-light information transfer.\n\nUnlocks: Basic chiral communicators, network connection protocols.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced BT countermeasures
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop weapons and defensive systems specifically designed to combat Beach Things. Standard weapons are largely ineffective against supernatural entities.\n\nUnlocks: Hematic weapons, chiral grenades, BT repulsion fields.

ResearchProjectDef.label: chiral fabrication
ResearchProjectDef.description: Master the art of using chiral matter as a fabrication medium. Objects created from chiral matter have unique properties and enhanced durability.\n\nUnlocks: Chiral printers, matter assembly systems, advanced manufacturing.

ResearchProjectDef.label: DOOMS enhancement
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research methods to safely enhance and control DOOMS abilities. Proper training can reduce the risks while amplifying the benefits of supernatural perception.\n\nUnlocks: DOOMS training facilities, ability enhancement procedures, strain reduction techniques.

ResearchProjectDef.label: dimensional manipulation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to manipulate the boundaries between dimensions. This dangerous research can provide immense power but risks catastrophic consequences.\n\nUnlocks: Dimensional anchors, reality stabilizers, void containment systems.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: Your researchers have successfully manipulated dimensional boundaries. This technology offers incredible possibilities but also poses extreme risks. Use with caution.

ResearchProjectDef.label: voidout prevention
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop systems to detect and prevent voidout events. These reality-annihilating explosions represent the ultimate supernatural threat.\n\nUnlocks: Voidout prediction systems, dimensional stabilizers, emergency evacuation protocols.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: Your colony has achieved the ultimate goal: the ability to prevent voidout events. This knowledge could save countless lives and preserve entire regions from annihilation.

ResearchProjectDef.label: chiral network mastery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Achieve complete understanding of the chiral network's deeper functions. This research unlocks the network's true potential for reconnecting humanity.\n\nUnlocks: Network administration tools, long-range communication arrays, data preservation systems.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Beach exploration
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research methods to safely explore the Beach dimension. This otherworldly realm holds secrets that could revolutionize understanding of life and death.\n\nUnlocks: Dimensional suits, Beach navigation equipment, consciousness projection technology.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: Your researchers have developed methods to safely explore the Beach dimension. This breakthrough opens new frontiers in understanding the nature of consciousness and reality itself.

ResearchProjectDef.label: temporal engineering
ResearchProjectDef.description: Master the manipulation of time itself through advanced chiral technology. This ultimate research allows control over temporal flow and aging processes.\n\nUnlocks: Time dilation fields, aging reversal chambers, temporal stasis systems.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: Your colony has achieved mastery over time itself. The ability to manipulate temporal flow represents the pinnacle of chiral technology and opens possibilities beyond imagination.

ResearchProjectDef.label: porter equipment
ResearchProjectDef.description: Design specialized equipment for surviving in the post-Death Stranding world. Porter gear emphasizes mobility, protection, and cargo capacity.\n\nUnlocks: Porter backpacks, climbing equipment, load-balancing systems.

ResearchProjectDef.label: biometric security
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop security systems based on biological identification. In a world of supernatural entities, distinguishing between human and non-human becomes critical.\n\nUnlocks: Biometric scanners, human verification systems, imposter detection.
